meanings.definition: To consume the flesh of one's own species.
meanings.sent1: The hungry lion cannibalizes its own kind when food is scarce.
meanings.sent2: The tribe's tradition forbids them to cannibalize their fellow tribe members.
meanings.sent3: In the spooky story, the monster cannibalizes its own kind for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The greedy villain cannibalizes his allies' resources to satisfy his own desires.
meanings.sent5: The ancient tribe believed that cannibalizing their enemies would grant them strength.

meanings.definition: To use parts of a machine or system to repair or build another machine or system.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic cannibalizes old cars to fix up new ones.
meanings.sent2: The engineer decided to cannibalize the broken printer to repair the photocopier.
meanings.sent3: The robot cannibalizes its spare parts to build a mini companion robot.
meanings.sent4: The artist creatively cannibalizes old gadgets to make unique sculptures.
meanings.sent5: The DIY enthusiast cannibalizes old furniture to create new and innovative designs.
